extends AbstractEntityManagerImpl

      • findAndResolveBySource

        public java.util.List<EntityReferenceDto<?,?>> findAndResolveBySource(UserDto user,
                                                             ReferenceDto<?> from,
                                                             java.util.Collection<?> fields)
        Returns the references with the given source end, and these references will be resolved. It means that the fromDto property of the returned references will be valid! This is a more expensive call than EntityReferenceDao.findBySource.
        Parameters:
        user - will be used to determine the access rights when resolving the referenced entities.
